data.title: Sizzling List Of 7,456 Famous October Birthdays
data.meta_description: Famous October birthdays. Sizzling list of 7,456 famous people born in October including celebrities. Get free birthday ninja poster and more.
data.text:
Tip: Click the free October famous birthdays ninja poster above to save the high quality version. A new design will be generated for you everyday. Collect all 16 ninja poses.

Famous October Birthdays

The following 7,456 famous people including celebrities were born in the month of October. A random sample was chosen for each day. Click the after the name to explore the birth date info. You might also want to browse the filtered celebrity birthdays in October.

Zodiac signs for October are Libra ‚ôé and Scorpio ‚ôè. The modern birthstone for October is Opal while the mystical gemstone (based on Tibetan origin) is Jasper.

Hey! How‚Äôs your lovelife today? Just for fun! Try your love match score with anyone. Even officemates, schoolmates, or find out the score for your parents and relatives. Don‚Äôt limit yourself ‚Äì you can also pair yourself with any celebrity. It‚Äôs a FREE report. Nothing to buy!
